body: You’re a mediocre human being if you think that doujin is mediocre, but I’ll let you have your opinion.
also very mediocre recommendation lol

Whenever I see this doujin it always leaves a sour taste in my mouth. Not cause I’m racist, for one. It just doesn’t feel right having a stereotypical black guy with no manners, a “NIGGA” (sorry), in a Japanese doujin, definitely not my thing but I won’t bash others for liking it. I just feel like a black guy could be represented way better, in a much less stereotypical fashion, like y’know, a normal person who just happens to be black/have dark skin. Luckily this is a pretty shitty depiction of Shuten. Too small, too flat, not enough hips or ass; have you seen her in-game art? Her hips are HUGE and super sexy. In comparison she looks ANOREXIC in this doujin. This doesn’t doesn’t do any justice to her sexy image, utterly disappointing. I could’ve fapped to this doujin if she at was drawn at least 1/100th as sexy as she is in-game despite the stereotypical black guy.
In this cancerous comment section, spiral is a beacon of hope, that not everyone is completely lost.
Here’s an actual Shuten Doujin that lives up to her sexiness: nhentai.net/g/301043/

This particular brand of stereotyping has been called "sexual threat" or "sexual racism." Fear of Black male sexuality in particular is said to be a core reason for the subjugation of Black American men. Historically, Black men were described as sub-human, animalistic, and lust-driven. This reasoning concludes that Black men are a sexual threat to society and are prone to raping White women.
